Issue.creator: denyeart
Issue.summary: Automatically deploy CouchDB indexes upon chaincode install
Issue.description: If chaincode is not yet installed on peer, the chaincode definition step would create the channel_chaincode database to supports commits, but would not created indexes since the peer cannot yet execute chaincode. If the chaincode is installed at a later time, the install step would iterate through the peer’s CouchDB channel_chaincode databases and automatically deploy the default chaincode indexes that are included in the chaincode installation package.
